spec_data.Name: perl-Gnome2
spec_data.Description:
The Gnome2 module allows a perl developer to use the GNOME libraries.  Find out
more about GNOME+ at <http://www.gnome.org/>.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 09 Nov 2017 08:58:26 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl interface to the 2.x series of the GNOME libraries
